original_title: Animals in the Wild: Vol. 2: A Walk on the Wild Side
overview: Documentary, Science and Nature Documentaries - Explore the ways creatures of all shapes and sizes move their bodies in this nature program that combines animation with live-action footage to show the mechanics of animal motion in an entertaining and easy-to-understand fashion. Viewers interested in wildlife and science get a chance to examine the unique mechanisms that make gazelles, cheetahs, iguanas, sea turtles and beetles move.
title: Animals in the Wild: Vol. 2: A Walk on the Wild Side
